member.name: T:Windows.ApplicationModel.Background.PhoneTrigger
member.summary: Represents a phone event that triggers a background task.

member.name: M:Windows.ApplicationModel.Background.PhoneTrigger.#ctor(Windows.ApplicationModel.Calls.Background.PhoneTriggerType,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the PhoneTrigger class.
member.param: Specifies the type of phone event.

Indicates if the trigger is a one-shot notification. If you weren't subscribed when a one-shot notification was sent, you get nothing. If you weren't connected when you fired a one-shot notification, nothing happens.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.Background.PhoneTrigger.OneShot
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating if the trigger is a one-shot notification.
member.returns: A Boolean value indicating if the trigger is a one-shot notification.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.Background.PhoneTrigger.TriggerType
member.summary: Gets the type of phone event indicated by the trigger.
member.returns: The type of phone event indicated by the trigger.

member.name: T:Windows.ApplicationModel.Calls.Background.PhoneCallBlockedReason
member.summary: Provides the reason why a phone call was rejected.

member.name: F:Windows.ApplicationModel.Calls.Background.PhoneCallBlockedReason.InCallBlockingList
member.summary: The call was rejected because it was in the blocking list.

member.name: F:Windows.ApplicationModel.Calls.Background.PhoneCallBlockedReason.PrivateNumber
member.summary: The call was rejected because it was a private number and private numbers are blocked.

member.name: F:Windows.ApplicationModel.Calls.Background.PhoneCallBlockedReason.UnknownNumber
member.summary: The call was rejected because it was an unknown number and unknown numbers are blocked.

member.name: T:Windows.ApplicationModel.Calls.Background.PhoneCallBlockedTriggerDetails
member.summary: Used to provide the details about a call that was just blocked.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.Calls.Background.PhoneCallBlockedTriggerDetails.CallBlockedReason
member.summary: Gets the reason why a phone call was blocked.
member.returns: The reason for blocking the phone call.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.Calls.Background.PhoneCallBlockedTriggerDetails.LineId
member.summary: Gets the ID of the phone call that was just blocked.
member.returns: The ID of the blocked phone call.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.Calls.Background.PhoneCallBlockedTriggerDetails.PhoneNumber
member.summary: Gets the phone number of the blocked call.
member.returns: The phone number of the call that was blocked.

member.name: T:Windows.ApplicationModel.Calls.Background.PhoneCallOriginDataRequestTriggerDetails
member.summary: Used to provide the origin details of the phone call.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.Calls.Background.PhoneCallOriginDataRequestTriggerDetails.PhoneNumber
member.summary: Gets the phone number for the origin of the phone call.
member.returns: The phone number of the phone call origin.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.Calls.Background.PhoneCallOriginDataRequestTriggerDetails.RequestId
member.summary: Gets the unique identifier for this phone call.
member.returns: The unique identifier for this phone call.

member.name: T:Windows.ApplicationModel.Calls.Background.PhoneIncomingCallDismissedReason
member.summary: Indicates the reason for IncomingCallDismissed trigger.

member.name: F:Windows.ApplicationModel.Calls.Background.PhoneIncomingCallDismissedReason.CallRejected
member.summary: Incoming call is being dismissed due to rejection by the user.

member.name: F:Windows.ApplicationModel.Calls.Background.PhoneIncomingCallDismissedReason.ConnectionLost
member.summary: Incoming call is being dismissed due to a lost connection.

member.name: F:Windows.ApplicationModel.Calls.Background.PhoneIncomingCallDismissedReason.TextReply
member.summary: Incoming call is being dismissed due to text reply response by the user.

member.name: F:Windows.ApplicationModel.Calls.Background.PhoneIncomingCallDismissedReason.Unknown
member.summary: Incoming call is being dismissed unexpectedly. Reason is unknown.

member.name: T:Windows.ApplicationModel.Calls.Background.PhoneIncomingCallDismissedTriggerDetails
member.summary: The trigger details for the IncomingCallDismissed trigger.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.Calls.Background.PhoneIncomingCallDismissedTriggerDetails.DismissalTime
member.summary: The time when the incoming call was dismissed.
member.returns: **DateTime** representing the time the incoming call was dismissed.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.Calls.Background.PhoneIncomingCallDismissedTriggerDetails.DisplayName
member.summary: The name of the caller (if available).
member.returns: String representing the name of the caller.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.Calls.Background.PhoneIncomingCallDismissedTriggerDetails.LineId
member.summary: The LineId for the incoming call being dismissed.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.Calls.Background.PhoneIncomingCallDismissedTriggerDetails.PhoneNumber
member.summary: The phone number for the incoming call being dismissed.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.Calls.Background.PhoneIncomingCallDismissedTriggerDetails.Reason
member.summary: The reason why the incoming call is dismissed.
member.returns: PhoneIncomingCallDismissedReason representing why the incoming call is dismissed.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.Calls.Background.PhoneIncomingCallDismissedTriggerDetails.TextReplyMessage
member.summary: The text message of the reply (if available).
member.returns: String representing the text message of the reply.

member.name: T:Windows.ApplicationModel.Calls.Background.PhoneLineChangedTriggerDetails
member.summary: Used to provide the details about a change to the properties of a phone line.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.Calls.Background.PhoneLineChangedTriggerDetails.ChangeType
member.summary: Gets a PhoneLineChangeKind value that indicates if the phone line was added, removed, or changed.
member.returns: A PhoneLineChangeKind value that indicates if the phone line was added, removed, or changed.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.Calls.Background.PhoneLineChangedTriggerDetails.LineId
member.summary: Gets the ID of the phone line that was added, removed, or changed.
member.returns: The ID of the phone line that was added, removed, or changed.

member.name: M:Windows.ApplicationModel.Calls.Background.PhoneLineChangedTriggerDetails.HasLinePropertyChanged(Windows.ApplicationModel.Calls.Background.PhoneLineProperties)
member.summary: Checks a phone line against a set of flags to see if any of the specified properties of the phone line have changed.
member.param: A set of flags which indicate the phone line properties to query for changes.
member.returns: Returns true if any of the properties indicated by the *lineProperty* parameter have changed on the phone line.

member.name: T:Windows.ApplicationModel.Calls.Background.PhoneLineChangeKind
member.summary: Indicates the type of change for a background phone line change trigger.

member.name: F:Windows.ApplicationModel.Calls.Background.PhoneLineChangeKind.Added
member.summary: A new phone line was added.

member.name: F:Windows.ApplicationModel.Calls.Background.PhoneLineChangeKind.PropertiesChanged
member.summary: A phone line has updated properties.

member.name: F:Windows.ApplicationModel.Calls.Background.PhoneLineChangeKind.Removed
member.summary: A phone line was removed.

member.name: T:Windows.ApplicationModel.Calls.Background.PhoneLineProperties
member.summary: Indicates a set of property flags that are part of a phone line changed trigger. Multiple properties can be set at one time.

member.name: F:Windows.ApplicationModel.Calls.Background.PhoneLineProperties.BrandingOptions
member.summary: The branding options for the phone line.

member.name: F:Windows.ApplicationModel.Calls.Background.PhoneLineProperties.CanDial
member.summary: The ability to dial outgoing calls on the phone line.

member.name: F:Windows.ApplicationModel.Calls.Background.PhoneLineProperties.CellularDetails
member.summary: The cellular details for the phone line.

member.name: F:Windows.ApplicationModel.Calls.Background.PhoneLineProperties.DisplayColor
member.summary: The preferred display color for the phone line.

member.name: F:Windows.ApplicationModel.Calls.Background.PhoneLineProperties.DisplayName
member.summary: The user assigned friendly name of the phone line.

member.name: F:Windows.ApplicationModel.Calls.Background.PhoneLineProperties.NetworkName
member.summary: The name of the current network that is being used by the phone line.

member.name: F:Windows.ApplicationModel.Calls.Background.PhoneLineProperties.NetworkState
member.summary: The current network status of the phone line.

member.name: F:Windows.ApplicationModel.Calls.Background.PhoneLineProperties.None
member.summary: No property.

member.name: F:Windows.ApplicationModel.Calls.Background.PhoneLineProperties.Transport
member.summary: The transport (cellular or voice over IP) for the phone line.

member.name: F:Windows.ApplicationModel.Calls.Background.PhoneLineProperties.Voicemail
member.summary: The voice mail account associated with the phone line.

member.name: T:Windows.ApplicationModel.Calls.Background.PhoneNewVoicemailMessageTriggerDetails
member.summary: Used to provide the details about a new voice mail message on a phone line.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.Calls.Background.PhoneNewVoicemailMessageTriggerDetails.LineId
member.summary: Gets the ID of the phone line for which the new voice mail arrived.
member.returns: The ID of the phone line for the new voice mail.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.Calls.Background.PhoneNewVoicemailMessageTriggerDetails.OperatorMessage
member.summary: Gets the optional voice mail changed message set by an operator when they send a voice mail changed SMS.
member.returns: The optional voice mail changed message set by an operator when they send a voice mail changed SMS. If the message exists, it is displayed on the voice mail toast if the toast is displayed.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.Calls.Background.PhoneNewVoicemailMessageTriggerDetails.VoicemailCount
member.summary: Gets the new count of voice mail messages for the phone line.
member.returns: The current count of voice mail messages.

member.name: T:Windows.ApplicationModel.Calls.Background.PhoneTriggerType
member.summary: Indicates a type of event for a phone trigger.

member.name: F:Windows.ApplicationModel.Calls.Background.PhoneTriggerType.AirplaneModeDisabledForEmergencyCall
member.summary: Airplane mode on a phone line was disabled so the phone could make an emergency call.

member.name: F:Windows.ApplicationModel.Calls.Background.PhoneTriggerType.CallBlocked
member.summary: The call was blocked.

member.name: F:Windows.ApplicationModel.Calls.Background.PhoneTriggerType.CallHistoryChanged
member.summary: The call history has changed.

member.name: F:Windows.ApplicationModel.Calls.Background.PhoneTriggerType.CallOriginDataRequest
member.summary: A request was made for the origin of the phone call.

member.name: F:Windows.ApplicationModel.Calls.Background.PhoneTriggerType.IncomingCallDismissed
member.summary: The incoming call was dismissed. Currently limited to first party use only.

member.name: F:Windows.ApplicationModel.Calls.Background.PhoneTriggerType.LineChanged
member.summary: The PhoneLineProperties have changed.

member.name: F:Windows.ApplicationModel.Calls.Background.PhoneTriggerType.NewVoicemailMessage
member.summary: The system received a new voice mail message or the voice mail count went to 0.
